data.title: HAT Distribution
data.text:
Paessler

Paessler

IT & IOT MONITORING EXPERTS SINCE 1997

Our Paessler Product Portfolio

Our solutions help Australian companies keep their infrastructure up, running, and optimized, while keeping everything surprisingly simple.

Choose the product suited to the size of your environment, the type of industry you’re in, and whether you want your monitoring on-premises or hosted by Paessler.

The solution that made the Paessler name well-known. Use it to monitor small and midsize infrastructures.

Awesome maps and dashboards, flexible alerting, multiple user interfaces, in-depth reporting, distributed monitoring, and more.

Our specialized enterprise solution, best for large and very large infrastructures operating across multiple locations.

It’s PRTG, but optimized for larger environments with powerful dashboards and support for monitoring business processes and SLAs.

Focus on your infrastructure and leave the hosting to us. Billed monthly or annually and based on your individual usage.

Everything PRTG has to offer, made available to you from the cloud. There’s no need for dedicated hardware.

TRUSTED BY 500,000 USERS WORLDWIDE

Core IT infrastructure

Security decision-makers consider ZTNA critical to their organization.

Large IT infrastructure

Monitor large environments, business processes and services, across multiple locations.

Cloud-based monitoring

Only pay for what you use: Simply focus on your infrastructure and leave the hosting to us.

Data center functionality

Monitor data centers and their environment to boost performance and avoid downtime.

Healthcare IT

Featuring support for protocols like DICOM and HL7: Monitor both your classic IT systems and healthcare IT.

Industrial IT & IoT

OPC UA, Modbus, MQTT, or gateways: Embrace digitalization as an opportunity by monitoring both IT and OT.

Property condition

Based on an SaaS system, with easy setup and fast insights: Monitor the condition of your properties.

And much more

Based on an SaaS system, with easy setup and fast insights: Monitor the condition of your properties.
